interestingcomments.content:
Remote camera control app for video? /!/ I have Snap Bridge installed but it seems it doesn't   allow for remote video shoot.  I have installed two other apps (one of them a Nikon app) but neither will connect to my camera. They don't even see the camera! Does anyone know of one that actually will? 
I have a D7500 and an Android phone.
